verses.verse: <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul!<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou art <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great;<s%> Thou art <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1935>splendor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty,<s%>
<S%H5844>Covering<s%> Thyself with <S%H216>light<s%> as with a <S%H8008>cloak,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretching<s%> out <S%H8064>heaven<s%> like a [tent] <S%H3407>curtain.<s%>

He <S%H9529>lays<s%> the <S%H9529>beams<s%> of His <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chambers<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> He <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> His <S%H7398>chariot;<s%> He <S%H1980>walks<s%> upon the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind;<s%>
He <S%H6213>makes<s%> the <S%H7307>winds<s%> His <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> <S%H3857>Flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> His <S%H8334>ministers.<s%>
He <S%H3245>established<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> upon its <S%H4349>foundations,<s%> So that it will not <S%H4131>totter<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with the <S%H8415>deep<s%> as with a <S%H3830>garment;<s%> The <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
At Thy <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> they <S%H5127>fled;<s%> At the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of Thy <S%H7482>thunder<s%> they <S%H2648>hurried<s%> <S%H2648>away.<s%>
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5927>rose;<s%> the <S%H1237>valleys<s%> <S%H3381>sank<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> To the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2088>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H3245>establish<s%> for them.
Thou didst <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H1366>boundary<s%> that they may not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over;<s%> That they may not <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sends<s%> forth <S%H4599>springs<s%> in the <S%H5158>valleys;<s%> They <S%H1980>flow<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%>
They <S%H8248>give<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H9583>field;<s%> The <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkeys<s%> <S%H7665>quench<s%> their <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

<S%H5921>Beside<s%> them the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H7931>dwell;<s%> They <S%H5414>lift<s%> up [their] <S%H6963>voices<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H9423>branches.<s%>

He <S%H8248>waters<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> from His <S%H5944>upper<s%> <S%H5944>chambers;<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of His <S%H4639>works.<s%>

He causes the <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> for the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> And <S%H6212>vegetation<s%> for the <S%H5656>labor<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> So that he may <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

And <S%H3196>wine<s%> which <S%H8055>makes<s%> man's <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H8055>glad,<s%> So that he may make [his] <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H9471>glisten<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> And <S%H3899>food<s%> which <S%H5582>sustains<s%> man's <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
The <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7646>drink<s%> their <S%H7646>fill,<s%> The <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H5193>planted,<s%>
<S%H834>Where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H7077>build<s%> their <S%H7077>nests,<s%> [And] the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> whose <S%H1004>home<s%> is the <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H1265>trees.<s%>
The <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are for the <S%H3277>wild<s%> <S%H3277>goats;<s%> The <S%H5553>cliffs<s%> are a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for the <S%H9627>rock<s%> <S%H9627>badgers.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> for the <S%H4150>seasons;<s%> The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H3996>place<s%> of its <S%H3996>setting.<s%>

Thou dost <S%H7896>appoint<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and it <S%H1961>becomes<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> In which <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest<s%> <S%H7430>prowl<s%> <S%H7430>about.<s%>
The <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> after their <S%H2964>prey,<s%> And <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H400>food<s%> from <S%H410>God.<s%>
[When] the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises<s%> they <S%H622>withdraw,<s%> And <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens.<s%>
<S%H120>Man<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to his <S%H6467>work<s%> And to his <S%H5656>labor<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7231>many<s%> are Thy <S%H4639>works!<s%> In <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> Thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H3605>all;<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of Thy <S%H7075>possessions.<s%>

<S%H2088>There<s%> is the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7342>broad,<s%> In <S%H8033>which<s%> are <S%H7431>swarms<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> <S%H9130>Animals<s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great.<s%>
<S%H8033>There<s%> the <S%H591>ships<s%> <S%H1980>move<s%> along, [And] <S%H3882>Leviathan,<s%> <S%H2088>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H3336>formed<s%> to <S%H7832>sport<s%> in it.
They <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7663>wait<s%> for Thee, To <S%H5414>give<s%> them their <S%H400>food<s%> in due <S%H6256>season.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H5414>give<s%> to them, they <S%H3950>gather<s%> [it] up; Thou dost <S%H6605>open<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> they are <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H9185>good.<s%>

Thou dost <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> they are <S%H926>dismayed;<s%> Thou dost <S%H622>take<s%> <S%H622>away<s%> their <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> they <S%H1478>expire,<s%> And <S%H7725>return<s%> to their <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H7971>send<s%> forth Thy <S%H7307>Spirit,<s%> they are <S%H1254>created;<s%> And Thou dost <S%H2318>renew<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
Let the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>endure<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> Let the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in His <S%H4639>works;<s%>
He <S%H5027>looks<s%> at the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H7460>trembles;<s%> He <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they <S%H6225>smoke.<s%>
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> as long as I <S%H9132>live;<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praise<s%> to my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5750>while<s%> I have my being.
Let my <S%H7879>meditation<s%> be <S%H6149>pleasing<s%> to Him; As for me, I shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Let <S%H2400>sinners<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
